caption.p: Transverse process bone graft group. A 43-year-old female with T4-5 TB received a transverse processes bone graft for reconstruction. (a–d) Preoperative X-ray and CT showed that T4 and T5 vertebral margins were irregularly destroyed and the intervertebral space narrowed. (e,f) Postoperative X-ray. (g–j) CT at 7 months postoperative showed bone fusion between T4 and T5. (k,l) X-ray at 12 months postoperative showed good location of posterior instrument and normal thoracic kyphosis.
